manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
- Enabled new music notes-like animation.
- Enabled new Stories UI.
- Enabled screenshot reshare.
- Enabled voice and sticker replies in media reply bar.
- Updated Stories toolbar design.
- Enabled Stories video trimmer.
- Enabled high quality settings.
- Enabled customisable Notes.
- Enabled set post as profile picture.
- Enabled blur background for Stories.
- Enabled Add to Spotify button for Music Notes.
- Enabled Saved button in profile.
- Enabled new Rosalia font.
- Enabled lyrics for “Listening Now” notes.
- Enabled customize option for already sent media.
- Enabled Remix button in simplified more menu.
- Enabled swipe down to dismiss clips.
- Enabled branded themes.
- Changed GIFs and Stickers provider.
- Updated media previews in the Direct gallery (long press to access).
- Disabled Map icon in Direct.
- Disabled Reels PiP (temporarily).
- Updated notification settings page.
- Updated video editor toolbars.
- Updated old flags.
- Updated designs.
- Fixed Stories reply bar.
- Fixed some minor bugs. (If you find any, just tell me)
manifest.name: Zain's Backup
manifest.description: This backup maked for the newest features!
